summary: Key decisions: VIB-005 monitoring dashboard with real-time health checks. Then we built VIB-006 advanced AI context preservation with decision trees and conversation snapshots. Finally we implemented VIB-007 smart automation with 5 rules including auto-commit docs, proactive validation, and smart healing.
